name: Costume Crash
description:
Game submission for St. Louis Scatter Jam 2017, October 13-15. Our team developed a costume fighting game where each costume grants a unique ability and a stat change or two. If hit while wearing a mask, that player's mask is removed. If hit without wearing a mask, that player is knocked out until the next round. Enjoy! 

Music credit: A Wonderful Nightmare by SniperDave (public domain content)
